plot: A fatal Virus has turned the inhabitants of an entire city into ravenous Zombies. The future of a small group of survivors relies on the outstanding Martial Arts abilities of Chris Burnside...
title: Dead Survivors
plot_es: A fatal Virus has turned the inhabitants of an entire city into ravenous Zombies. The future of a small group of survivors relies on the outstanding Martial Arts abilities of Chris Burnside...
plot_en: A fatal Virus has turned the inhabitants of an entire city into ravenous Zombies. The future of a small group of survivors relies on the outstanding Martial Arts abilities of Chris Burnside...
